sentences.en: I just got BBC on shortwave. Same bulletins as last night.
sentences.cn: 我刚刚收听了英国广播电台的短波,和昨天晚上一样的新闻.

sentences.en: I spend about two to three hours a week listening to my shortwave receiver.
sentences.cn: 每个星期,我都要花两三个钟头来收听我的收音机.

sentences.en: I use the shortwave radio to get the latest war news.
sentences.cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新战事新闻。

sentences.en: It's got AM, FM, shortwave, longwave, SSB and aircraft band frequencies.
sentences.cn: 它的获得时, 调频, 短波, 长波, SSB及飞机频段频率.

sentences.en: Shortwave broadcasting is expensive, and the shortwave radio is on its way out.
sentences.cn: 国际短波发射过于昂贵, 短波收音机也已式微.

sentences.en: Simulation experimental results show this algorithm is immune to multi - path channel in shortwave channel.
sentences.cn: 仿真实验结果表明,在短波信道中,该算法具有较强的抗多径能力.

sentences.en: The variations of the selection of shortwave with the particle radius are different.
sentences.cn: 气泡和分相的散射都是各向异性,并且波长越短,散射越强.

sentences.en: The wavelength calibration Methods: Were investigated for shortwave infrared ( SWIR ) flat spectroradiometer.
sentences.cn: 针对自行研制的短波 红外 平场光谱仪,讨论了波长定标的原理和方法.

sentences.en: This article introduced the kinds and performance parameters of shortwave aircraft antenna.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了机载短波天线类型及其性能参数.

sentences.en: This article presents a novel self - synchronizing audio watermark algorithm for shortwave narrow band channel.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种适应于短波窄带信道的自同步音频水印算法.

sentences.en: This method has been implemented in shortwave communication, and gets good gains.
sentences.cn: 这种方案已经在实际中得到了应用, 并取得了良好的效果.

sentences.en: Wireless pipeline modeling methods shortwave communication, are discussed in details.
sentences.cn: 特别是无线信道建模的方法, 详细分析了无线管道建模的14个阶段.

phrases.tran_cn: 短波无线电通信；短波广播

trans.tran_en: Shortwave is a range of short radio wavelengths used for broadcasting
